ygData.messageBody:
Ouch, i had a bad experience with the use of
auto-follow. I was leading my groupmate through the South
deasert of Ro, when i see him go down a steeper hill and
take just enough to kill him...<br>The next thing on
my screen is a message that says "You have slain
*****!"(i wont say the name) "your faction with most humans
has gone down!" My mouth drops 10 feet irl, i rushed
back to freeport to the Ikthars armor to check the
price on plate. AGH what do you mean 300pp for a plate
bracer?!?!?! i bought it for 266. So i sat around for 2 days
untill a GM actually got to me. After checking for about
15 min, The GM told me that there was no way for him
or me to change my faction back, and just saying he
would log it as a bug! So basically i put 15 points
into my starting charisma for nothing. I think thats
badly designed because a group member could be
auto-following you without you knowing it. Sure the follower
gets a message saying the y might fall in pits, but
they dont loose any exp! In my opinion the real danger
is to the leader, if you have a weak member and
unsteady factions this could ruin you character. I felt i
had to warn as many people as possible aobut this.
Have any ideas on helping my faction or have opinions
on the subject please post a message.<br><br>Kaylin
Danmor, 28th League Standing, Minstrel of Norrath.
